医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国范围内的新冠疫苗接种覆盖率研究揭示了差距和可预防的住院治疗根据第一项关于整个英国人口的 COVID-19 疫苗覆盖率的研究，到 2022 年夏季，英国四个国家中有三分之一到一半的人口没有接种建议数量的新冠疫苗和加强疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/UK-wide-COVID-vaccination-coverage-study-reveals-gaps-and-preventable-hospitalizations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/UK-wide-COVID-vaccination-coverage-study-reveals-gaps-and-preventable-hospitalizations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=439744ee-1553-4839-9c90-8b6bef6453b7 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 12:22:54 -0500 UK-wide COVID vaccination coverage study reveals gaps and preventable hospitalizations
尿素驱动的纳米机器人可将小鼠膀胱肿瘤减少 90%这项在小鼠身上进行的研究展示了这些微小的纳米机器如何通过尿液中的尿素推动并精确瞄准肿瘤，并利用其表面携带的放射性同位素攻击肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Urea-powered-nanorobots-reduce-bladder-tumors-by-9025-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Urea-powered-nanorobots-reduce-bladder-tumors-by-9025-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3005506d-6e36-40bb-9de7-4d95c5d208fc Tue, 16 Jan 2024 12:06:10 -0500 Urea-powered nanorobots reduce bladder tumors by 90% in mice
阿姆斯特丹 UMC 项目旨在利用盖茨的资助开发第一种有效的艾滋病毒疫苗据估计，全世界有 4000 万人感染艾滋病毒。这个群体的三分之二在非洲大陆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Amsterdam-UMC-project-aims-for-first- effective-HIV-vaccine-with-Gates-funding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Amsterdam-UMC-project-aims-for-first- effective-HIV-vaccine-with-Gates-funding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d580eac7-e21f-45e2-8924-c1e3eea8fed5 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 11:54:01 -0500 Amsterdam UMC project aims for first effective HIV vaccine with Gates funding
青春期的高脂肪量可能会加剧成年早期的胰岛素抵抗和肥胖一项新的研究显示，青春期的高脂肪量会导致胰岛素抵抗，这可能会导致胰岛素抵抗恶化和成年后肥胖的恶性循环。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/High-fat-mass-in-adolescent-could-worsen-insulin-resistance-and-obesity-by-young-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/High-fat-mass-in-adolescent-could-worsen-insulin-resistance-and-obesity-by-young-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=470ce7d7-a5b7-4883-90c7-defea05e1035 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 11:49:16 -0500 High fat mass in adolescence could worsen insulin resistance and obesity by young adulthood
新的粉尘测试方法更好地保护工人免受肺部疾病的侵害昆士兰大学研究人员开发的一种新的粉尘测试方法可以为工人提供更好的保护，使其免受黑肺病和矽肺病等疾病的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/New-dust-testing-methodology-better-protects-workers-from-lung-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/New-dust-testing-methodology-better-protects-workers-from-lung-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3022e48-ed3a-4e5f-ae74-54c1b4019165 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 09:36:01 -0500 New dust testing methodology better protects workers from lung diseases
研究强调健康饮食对儿童心脏健康的重要性东芬兰大学最近的一项研究表明，更健康的饮食与血清代谢物浓度相关，表明学龄儿童的心血管健康状况已经更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-highlights-importance-of-healthy-eating-for-childrens-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-highlights-importance-of-healthy-eating-for-childrens-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8e93f58-44be-438e-aa78-69577bd93848 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 09:28:31 -0500 Study highlights importance of healthy eating for children's heart health
将癌症患者的健康数据与全基因组序列数据相结合可以帮助医生提供更有针对性的护理研究人员评估了将全基因组测序数据与 33 种癌症类型的 13,880 个肿瘤的临床结果相结合的影响，并通过 100,000 基因组癌症计划评估了英国 NHS 内精准护理的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Combining-health-data-with-whole-genome-sequence-data-in-cancer-患者-can-help-doctors-provide-more-tailored-护理.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Combining-health-data-with-whole-genome-sequence-data-in-cancer-患者-can-help-doctors-provide-more-tailored- care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7025c13c-a988-4b33-b4d7-7d156ccab2ed Tue, 16 Jan 2024 09:26:00 -0500 Combining health data with whole genome sequence data in cancer patients can help doctors provide more tailored care
研究发现低剂量钙在预防先兆子痫和早产方面与世界卫生组织建议的高剂量钙一样有效研究人员评估了印度和坦桑尼亚孕妇每日 500 毫克钙补充剂与 1500 毫克钙补充剂在预防先兆子痫和早产方面的非劣效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-finds-low-dose-calcium-as- effective-as-the-WHOs-recommended-high-dose-in-preventing-preeclampsia-and-早产.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-finds-low-dose-calcium-as- effective-as-the-WHOs-recommended-high-dose-in-preventing-preeclampsia-and-早产.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91f08f54-bd91-4c8a-a69a-6b381b62b617 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 08:54:00 -0500 Study finds low-dose calcium as effective as the WHO's recommended high-dose in preventing preeclampsia and preterm births
新研究显示脑葡萄糖如何影响真菌病治疗真菌性脑膜炎病原体新型隐球菌中代谢物-药物-真菌的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/New-study-shows-how-brain-glucose-affects-fungal-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/New-study-shows-how-brain-glucose-affects-fungal-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0425254-8395-416f-8798-9b00e8dc2bc4 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 08:37:00 -0500 New study shows how brain glucose affects fungal disease treatment
研究揭示皮肤微生物组在衰老和皮肤健康中的关键作用与皮肤衰老相关的微生物类群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-reveals-key-role-of-skin-microbiome-in-aging-and-skin-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240116/Study-reveals-key-role-of-skin-microbiome-in-aging-and-skin-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc790c1a-c7c5-44dc-84e0-9592f18644d6 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 08:04:00 -0500 Study reveals key role of skin microbiome in aging and skin health
